name: Light of Ruin
summary: Deals damage. Causes the user to receive recoil damage of 1/3 the damage dealt.
viability: This is a very powerful fairy move that can only be learned by Eternal Flower Floette. With 140 damage it is a very good option to replace moonblast if you want to deal more damage. Unfortunately, only Eternal Flower Floette can learn this move.
